snippet: The new book “Enough” is co-written by the former Arizona congresswoman and her husband, Mark Kelly.
abstract: Former congress woman Gabrielle Giffords and her husband Mark Kelly are co-authors of book Enough, addressing issue of gun violence.
lead_paragraph: The new book “Enough” is co-written by the former Arizona congresswoman and her husband, Mark Kelly.

headline.main: Giffords to Write Book on Gun Violence
headline.print_headline: Giffords and Husband Write About Gun Violence
